description: General OS performance metrics to assess the availability and performance of Linux and Windows systems. Leverages OpenTelemetry metrics collected with MetricsHub and stored in Prometheus.

MetricsHub-System-Network-Packets-Droppe.text: Network: High number of packet drops

panels.description: Utilization of the busiest core/processor, to identify CPU contention
panels.title: Max CPU Utilization

panels.description: Utilization of the busiest disk, to identify disk contention
panels.title: Max Disk Utilization

list.description: Excludes all filesystems whose type matches the specified regular expression
list.label: Exclude Filesystem Types
list.name: filesystemFilter

title: System Performance Metrics (MetricsHub)
